title: Riot, you have no excuse for defending Daniel Z Klein now.
body:
EDIT: DZK is no longer within Riot's employment.

https://kotaku.com/two-riot-employees-leave-under-complicated-circumstance-1828886072

I don't know if there's any further discussion to be had here. If mods find that there is none, you have my permission to lock the thread.

Original:
https://i.imgur.com/X7ffdZU.jpg

Retweeting this as if it's an acceptable stance is not something you should allow.

If this is considered "acceptable conduct" by an employee (and Riot Sanjuro has already proven otherwise), then you have dug yourself into a VERY SERIOUS shithole and you are NOT going to recover.
